nodes.text: The Guardians of the Breath were a group of Force-wielders allied with the Kashi Mer Dynasty. They kept the lore and methods by which the Kashi Mer interacted with the Force—which they called the Breath—alive through an oral tradition. The Guardians used their powers to aid in the raising of agricultural crops and the healing of the sick and injured. The Guardian Elders used the Breath to see visions of the future so they could guide their civilization.
